name: Intuit
description: Intuit has been on India's Best Companies to Work For list by the Great Place to Work. This year, we’re #15! At Intuit India our employees do the best work of their lives and focus on disruptive, bold and meaningful innovation that powers prosperity approximately 100 million customers around the world.
features: #15 On India's Best Place to Work list
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: The global financial technology platform that powers prosperity.
ShortDescription: At Intuit, we are powering prosperity around the world.

Highlights.name: AI-Driven Innovation
Highlights.description: Intuit leverages artificial intelligence to offer smarter and more efficient financial solutions.

Highlights.name: Financial Literacy Focus
Highlights.description: Intuit goes beyond software, offering initiatives to educate individuals and students about personal finance.

Highlights.name: Commitment to Sustainability
Highlights.description: Intuit addresses climate change through partnerships and focuses on building a sustainable future.

competitive_advantages: Established global user base (4.5M QuickBooks users)
